name: The Thumb War
description:
Make your way down to the swinging high street and battle it out to be the top dog of nail salons. An all out Thumb War has started and only one salon will be left standing. Be ready to paint those thumbs to victory!

Music:

Hillbilly Swing by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/5705-hillbilly-swing
License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license
